application.ref: A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

text.p: In the version of this Article initially published, in the first sentence of the second paragraph of the section titled "Blue carbon wealth redistribution, " there was an error. In the sentence reading: "The five donor countries that generate the largest blue carbon wealth surpluses are, in addition to Australia: Indonesia, Cuba, Russia and Papua New Guinea, " the country Papua New Guinea should instead have read as "Guinea-Bissau.In the version of this Article initially published, in the first sentence of the second paragraph of the section titled "Blue carbon wealth redistribution, " there was an error. In the sentence reading: "The five donor countries that generate the largest blue carbon wealth surpluses are, in addition to Australia: Indonesia, Cuba, Russia and Papua New Guinea, " the country Papua New Guinea should instead have read as "Guinea-Bissau.
